events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role and will review your qualifications thoroughly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your experience in software development.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact throughout the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening and your background in devops and software engineering looks promising.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the next stages of our interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th to discuss your software development expertise in detail.
The technical interview was completed successfully with strong demonstration of your engineering skills.
We have scheduled your HR interview to discuss cultural fit and benefits on May 15th at 10 AM.
Your HR interview went well, covering company values and your expectations for the role.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position with competitive compensation.
The candidate has provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed eagerness to join our engineering team.
You have accepted the offer, and we are looking forward to welcoming you to our engineering team.
The onboarding process has started to ensure you have everything needed for a successful first day.
The hiring process is now closed, and you are officially a valued member of our software engineering team.
